name: Spare The Change
description:
Help Sue and Rich escape the hand coming to capture them!
Once you're out of the pocket, you're not coming back...

Play with a friend, it's dangerous to go alone! (Unless you're up for a challenge)

Regoli - Leading Programmer
Rakunuki - Leading Artist
Staintocton - Leading Composer/Sound Designer

We hope you all enjoy this co-op game!
